data: Hi there! Type help for list of available commands.

response:
The following commands can be used:
 info: User info 
 projects: User projects 
 skills: User skills 
 clear: Clear the terminal 
 home: Goto Home 
 gui: Switch to Graphical Mode
My name is Hardik Singh.\n I am a Computer Science Sophomore at NIT Kurukshetra.\n Github Username: fusionmaster7
